condition.ab: The papyrus has a dark brown color. The original cutting lines has been preserved on the left, right and bottom sides of the papyrus. There is one vertical tear from the top to the bottom at a distance of one-third the papyrus��� width from the left border. The top of the papyrus is missing and the right top corner of the remaining text has been partially torn off. There is a right margin of 1.5 cm and bottom margin of 3 cm. The papyrus needs to be glassed.

handDesc.p: The text is written in black ink with a thin pen perpendicular to the papyrus fibers. The scribe shows the characteristics of first-second/seven-eighth century writing. There are a few diacritical dots. The verso is blank.
